description: Finding object provides details related to a finding generated by security tool.
caption: Finding Details
name: finding

created_time.description: The time when the finding was created.

desc.description: The description of the reported finding.

first_seen_time.description: The time when the finding was first observed.

last_seen_time.description: The time when the finding was most recently observed.

modified_time.description: The time when the finding was last modified.

product_uid.description: The unique identifier of the product that reported the finding.

src_url.description: The URL pointing to the source of the finding.

title.description: The title of the reported finding.

types.description: One or more types of the reported finding.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the reported finding.
